name: Lone Survivor/Wacky Painter
description:
Made in 48 hours for GameJolt's #badboxart Game Jam. The goal was to create a game based on... well... bad box art.

"Only one copy was found of Historicorp's masterpiece 2-pack Lone Survivor/Wacky Painter, found amongst the documents in the late developer's office. Unfortunately, time had irreversibly warped the cartridge, and so we were only able to recover a highly temperamental version. Never the less, enjoy this unstable but faithful restoration."

Many thanks to freesound and splatsofblood.
